#include<stdio.h>

int gcd(int p, int q)
{
    if(p==q || p==0)
        return q;
    else if (q==0)
        return p;
    else if(p>q)
        return gcd(q,p%q);
    else
        return  gcd(p,q%p);
}

int main()
{
    int t;
    int p,q,r;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        scanf("%d%d",&p,&q);
        if((float)p/q > 2)
        {   printf("NO\n"); continue;}
        r=gcd(p,q);
        p=p/r;
        q=q/r;
        while(q%2==0)
            q=q>>1;
        if((p&(p-1))==0 && ((q+1)&q)==0)
            printf("YES\n");
        else
            printf("NO\n");

    }
    return 0;
}
